reviews.title: OK place
reviews.text: I was going to spend a few days with my daughter who lives in Cerritos and this hotel was the closest to her home.
The place is OK but it needs some TLC from the owners. It looks too rundown.
reviews.title: Almost perfect stay

reviews.text: The room was clean but the security lock didn't work.
reviews.title: Hotel is Gross and old

reviews.text: The water from the faucet had a very bad taste; so, I ended using bottled water to brush my teeth.
reviews.title: Unwelcomed disabled guest!

reviews.text: My room was in the first floor and I had a hard time with the noises coming from the room on top of my room.
reviews.title: Good place to rest
